titles.title: Expressing the sense of Congress that mediators should be used in discussions between Congress and the President to produce a balanced budget.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight. subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Government Management, Information and Technology.

committee.name: House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight

bill.summary: 1/31/1996--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the Congress that the President and the Congress should use mediators to resolve differences over balancing the budget in seven years.
